paper_abstract: This work studies the problem of solving a sup-T composite finite relation equation over a complete lattice L. where T is a conjuctor. A criterion for the equation to have a solution is given. An algorithm for finding the Solution Set of the equation is presented. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On finite relation equations with sup-conjunctor composition over a complete lattice
